data.comment: The match has started at CenturyLink Field.
Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for San Jose at CenturyLink Field.
Throw-in for San Jose in the half of Seattle.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 4, Jordan Morris is on target to give Seattle a 1-0 advantage.
Xavier Arreaga instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Seattle push upfield but Allen Chapman quickly pulls them for offside.
Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 11, Allen Chapman awards Seattle a goal kick.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
Raul Ruidiaz puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
In the minute 12, Great play from Nicolas Lodeiro to set up the goal.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cristian Espinoza gets his shot on target but fails to score for San Jose.
In the minute 15, It's now 3-0 in Seattle as Kelvin Leerdam scores for Seattle.
Joevin Jones with an assist there.
Throw-in for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 17, San Jose to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Seattle have a goal kick.
Seattle take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Joevin Jones.
In the minute 20, That's a fine assist from Raul Ruidiaz.
Nouhou Tolo for Seattle drives towards goal at CenturyLink Field. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Seattle in the half of San Jose.
In the minute 24, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
In the minute 26, Throw-in San Jose.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seattle.
In the minute 28, Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
Allen Chapman signals a Seattle throw-in in San Jose's half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Seattle.
In the minute 30, At CenturyLink Field, Andy Rios has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Seattle's Kelvin Leerdam breaks free at CenturyLink Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
In the minute 31, San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in San Jose.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, Goal! Seattle extend their lead to 5-0 through Raul Ruidiaz.
Jordan Morris instrumental with a fine assist.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 36, Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Seattle needs to be cautious. San Jose have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
In the minute 38, Seattle drives forward and Jordan Morris gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In Seattle, Chris Wondolowski of San Jose is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to San Jose.
Throw-in for San Jose close to the penalty box.
San Jose's Cristian Espinoza gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Seattle defender.
In the minute 43, Seattle's Joevin Jones gets in a shot on goal at CenturyLink Field. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Yeimar Gomez Andrade (Seattle) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 43, San Jose have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Seattle in the half of San Jose.
The first-half has come to a close in Seattle.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Brian Schmetzer (Seattle) is making a first substitution, with Shane O'Neill replacing Yeimar Gomez Andrade.
Goal! Joao Paulo extends Seattle's lead to 6-0.
In the minute 48, Great play from Kelvin Leerdam to set up the goal.
Allen Chapman signals a San Jose throw-in in Seattle's half.
Can San Jose capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 50, San Jose are pushing forward but Oswaldo Alanis's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seattle.
Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
Seattle's Kelvin Leerdam gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 55, Allen Chapman awards San Jose a goal kick.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 57, Will Bruin is replacing Raul Ruidiaz for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 58, San Jose to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
San Jose have a dangerous throw-in.
Brian Schmetzer is making the team's third substitution at CenturyLink Field with Jordy Delem replacing Cristian Roldan.
The home team replace Kelvin Leerdam with Alex Roldan.
Seattle take a comfortable 7-0 lead thanks to Joevin Jones.
In the minute 59, That's a fine assist from Jordan Morris.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
San Jose push forward at CenturyLink Field and Cristian Espinoza gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Seattle defence.
Throw-in for San Jose at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 64, Nick Lima is replacing Judson for the away team.
Shea Salinas is on a sub for Vako Qazaishvili for San Jose.
In the minute 64, Tommy Thompson is replacing Paul Marie for the away team.
San Jose make their fourth substitution with Eric Calvillo replacing Andy Rios.
The away team have replaced Cristian Espinoza with Cade Cowell. This is the third substitution made today by Matias Jesus Almeyda.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
Marcos Lopez of San Jose smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 68, Allen Chapman signals a throw-in for San Jose, close to Seattle's area.
Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 71, An attacking San Jose player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Chris Wondolowski keeps San Jose in contention with a penalty, making the score 7-1.
Allen Chapman awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 79, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Seattle.
Seattle drive upfield and Nouhou Tolo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a San Jose defender.
Throw-in San Jose.
In the minute 85, Seattle make their fifth substitution with Josh Atencio replacing Nicolas Lodeiro.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 86, Chris Wondolowski is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Chris Wondolowski has recovered and rejoins the match in Seattle.
Throw-in for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
1 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Seattle.
Can Seattle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Jose's half?
The second-half is over. The match ends 7-1.
